author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR allows SeedingHitSet to accomodate up to 16 hits  (chosen as 4 Pixel Barrel + 12 Pixel Endcap Layers). The former constructors are kept for backward-compatibility. 

#### PR validation:

No regression expected. Technical PR.

All tests run.
title: Extending SeedingHitSet & SeedGeneratorFromProtoTracksEDProducer
